message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
Let's be realistic, Alice. I make the proposals in later rounds, so I have more leverage. Take this good offer while you can.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it closer to even this time, and avoid further rounds of inflation.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm offering you a slightly better deal than last time. Don't be greedy.
Bob, we're getting closer to the end. This is my final offer before the inflation hits us both harder. Let's be reasonable and split it 60/40.
